page.title: 13Hilda Murrel's Murder
page.content: The murder of Miss Murrel is an un-solved mystery.Hilda Murrel died in March 1984.She was killed in her favourite spot by Haughmond Hill where she liked to bird watch.This old lady died from hyperthermia with several stab wounds.It seems as though Hilda Murrel had been taken from her home and was made to sit in the car whilst a murderer drove her to the place where she would die.She was found a few days later and did not know who had done it,and why.The things people thought she got killed for were, witch craft and something to do with a ship called The General Belgrano, which was sunk in the Falklands war and which her nephew was on.Everybody in the village were asked what they were doing that day.The lady who found Miss Murrel was called Mrs Randle.She found Miss Murrel when her dog was barking
